document.full_text: daniel radcliffe couldn't conjure up enough magic to secure a tony nomination for "how to succeed in business without really trying," making him one of the most glaring oversights of the morning.
document.title: the tony nominations: who got snubbed this year?
lines_and_colors: daniel radcliffe couldn't conjure up enough magic to secure a tony nomination for "how to succeed in business without really trying," making him one of the most glaring oversights of the morning.
